question: Orange Line Metro Train, that was seen in news recently, was inaugurated in which country?
explanation:
Pakistan has recently inaugurated the first transport project under the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC) in Lahore.
The project has been completed in six years at the cost of over USD 2.2 billion. This overhead Lahore Orange Line Metro Train is expected as a symbol of China- Pakistan ties. Over 250,000 people will be able to commute using the train.
